department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide a Clean Steam Generator for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC).
description: The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) requires a Clean Steam Generator. Deliverables must be received on or before 5 January 2024. No security associated with the requirement. Conditionally limited to Canadian goods.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
# **Title:** Clean Steam Generator Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4030110561
**Publication Date:** June 30, 2023
**Closing Date:** August 2, 2023 @ 14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of a Clean Steam Generator to the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) - Aquatic and Crop Resource Development (ACRD). 

## **Requirements**

- A clean steam generator must be supplied to the NRC-ACRD.
- Deliverables must be received on or before January 5, 2024.
- The requirement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods.

## **Procurement Details**

- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** None
- **Regions of Delivery:** Charlottetown
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entities:** National Research Council of Canada (NRC)

## **Contact Information**

- Danny Arseneau (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## **Documentation**

The solicitation package, including further specifications and information, are available at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16737290?extsite=MTY3MzcyOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16737290?extsite=MTY3MzcyOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

Note: Versions of the above text in French are also available upon request. 
Note that for clarity, an empty field has been provided to the regions of opportunity instead of having "None". This makes easier to scan the most relevant procurement information. Please think about how your good (Clean Steam Generator) will make a direct or indirect impact in the lives of others.
